name: Jumping Bird
description:
Hopping Bird is a bird game. The bird would like to collect more cherries. But there are many hindrances / obstacles; lock, toadstool, etc. Help the cute bird by running and jumping.
Tap screen to jump and avoid obstacles.
There are a lot of levels and more coming

For Android game: https://play.google.com/store/search?q=alfonso2607 

For iOS only Download at https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/temple-adventure-runner-2016/id1094834103?ls=1&m...

More android and Apple games at: http://vamoose-game.com
